text:
Pretty MAJOR Child Theme Bug:
Wast just working in a customers account (ID: 6035394) and used the new "copy module to child theme" feature. There was an error and then that module is now GONE.  Here is more info in a Loom.

<https://www.loom.com/share/a563db6a9bc34786b79adeb87cddf48c>

Hey <@UA5DFM7CK>, I recommend contacting HubSpot Support <http://help.HubSpot.com|help.HubSpot.com>. Provide them this loom. Send me the support ticket ID. On my end I will leave some notes for the support person to help them get it resolved and the appropriate engineers involved.
Just emailed support with the same message.
<@UA5DFM7CK> do you mind posting here after the issue is resolved? I'd like to avoid this issue...
<@U7SL518D6> here is the ticket number to add your notes too.  #8262272
